name: BK968S Soldering Station,Digital Display Soldering Iron Station with Solder Sucker, Tweezers,Soldering Tips,Tin Wires, Sponge with Precision Temperature Control(356°F-896°F)
short_description: Full Digital Solder Station: You get not only a soldering station, but also the following essential accessories, solder sucker, tweezers, 5 soldering iron tips, 12G soldering wire, sponge, our full range of products allows you to better handle the entire soldering process for a variety of soldering scenarios.

Practical function: Our digital soldering iron Station has password protection to avoid illegal modification of the settings, and has a sleep function, which prevents oxidation of the Soldering iron, reduces wear and prolongs its service life. With this feature, the soldering iron tips and heating element will last longer!

Compact Design: With a compact body and large display, the Bakon BK968S is unlike other soldering stations in that it has a soldering holder integrated directly into the body of the station, making it ideal for users who have limited desk space but still solder as a hobby. Not only does our soldering station save space, but the holder is also made of high-temperature resistant material for safe storage.

Advanced Temperature Control: Temperature can be adjusted from 356 to 896°F with the control knob on the workstation, and the digital display reads the real-time temperature. Our built-in PID microcontroller quickly calculates temperature compensation to keep the iron head at a set, stable temperature. This allows you to solder more smoothly than with a soldering iron station without temperature stabilization.

name: YIHUA 939D+ III EVO Digital Soldering Iron Station Kit 110W High Power with LCD display, 4 Memory Channels, Sleep Mode, Digital Calibration, Solder Wire, Helping Hands, Magnifier, 3 Soldering Tips

The solder iron temperature range is 392~896°F adjustable, the built-in PID temperature stabilization programme keeps the temperature steady for a smooth soldering experience. This solder station include functions such as 4 memory channels, digital temperature calibration, and more. You can store four sets of temperature settings and quickly select any, so you don’t have to constantly adjust temperature settings for different work. We integrated the iron holder, cleaning kit, protective residual tray, soldering tips temporary storage slots, and solder wire dispenser into one stable holder to help clean up your workspace and improve the safety factor.

name: TOAUTO DS90 Soldering Station-°F & °C Dual Digital Display Soldering Iron Station Kit,90W Soldering Iron,302℉- 842℉ Temperature, Anti-Static & Grounding Wire, Auto Standby & Sleep,5 Solder Tips, Blue
short_description: 【UPGRADED VERSION-NEW REMOVE STATIC DESIGN & DUAL DIGITAL DISPLAY】 Upgraded to NEW Blue Version DS-90W for orders after March 7, 2022. The TOAUTO DS90 soldering station has a PATENTED UNIQUE grounding wire design & remove-static sheet, letting you focus on desoldering safely. Adding °F / °C dual digital display function, and the LED dual-color dual-row design mode selection is more intuitive, letting you no longer be confused by numbers.

【FAST HEATING & AUTO STANDBY SLEEP】DS90 Soldering Station uses a 90W High power ceramic heating core, heats up quickly, a soldering temperature of 590 °F is reached after about 5 seconds. When not used for 10 minutes, the soldering station automatically enters standby mode, when not used for 20 minutes, it will automatically enter sleep mode. Protecting you, your kids, and your pets from getting hurt.

【INTELLIGENT TEMPERATURE CONTROL】DS90 desoldering station adopts the high-end precision PID program, can monitor and correct the actual temperatures at high speed with fast temperature compensation to provide the accuracy that your projects ask for. In the temperature lock mode, constant temperature operation can be guaranteed.

【MULTIPLE SCENARIOS-IDEAL CHOICE】The upgraded DS90 desoldering station is designed for beginners and experts to provide you with a consistent welding experience.DS90 soldering station is ESD, CE, FCC, RoHS certified safety in use, can be used for PCB / SMD / SMT welding， it is ideal for industry and manufacturing, school laboratory, home, and hobby use, electronic DIY, and repair.

【LUXURIOUS 13-In-1 SOLDERING KIT】Upgraded TOAUTO DS90 Watt Soldering Station with 5 x Additional Soldering Tip,1x Bracket for solder On The Side,1x Roll of Lead-free Solder Wire(30g),1x Solder Sucker,1x Anti-static Tweezers,1x Brass Tip Cleaner, 1x Cleaning Sponge,1x Instruction Manual.TOAUTO will be provided for a 1-year warranty after-sales and lifetime technical support, and a 30-day return.

name: YIHUA 939D+ Digital Soldering Station, 75W Equivalent with Precision Heat Control (392°F to 896°F) and Built-in Transformer. ESD Safe, Lead Free with °C/°F display (Black)
short_description: Solidly-Built Powerful Soldering Station: the YIHUA 939D+ Soldering System is made for those who solder regularly. It’s so reliable that even industrial-level factories use this soldering station for over 10 hours every day for manufacturing. This station comes with high power performance, flexible temperature from 392°F to 896°F, faster heating up, enhanced temperature stabilization and enhanced performance. Get your soldering projects DONE with this capable & reliable 939D+ system!

Safety and Precision Matter: the professional-grade built-in transformer outputs contact-safe voltage without sacrificing its high power or performance. The system’s exclusive intelligence temperature control program monitors, and compensates in 20 milliseconds to keep the temp. stabilized and give you a consistent soldering experience. This is ideal for professional soldering, industrial & manufacturing, precision electronics, school labs, household & hobby uses, electronic DIYs & repair, etc.

Metallic Build & Heat-Resistant Design: the Yihua 939D+’s control panel is built with Brushed Aluminum so that you won’t leave any burnt marks by accident. The accompanying stand-alone iron stand is also solid metal-alloy. You can put it anywhere and organize your workspace in the way you like.

A Suite of Intelligent Features and Intuitive Usage: Clear Digital °F or °C Display, Automatic Detection to detect the handle’s status, Smart Temperature Control, Temperature Calibration Support. It’s super EASY to use. Switch between °F and °C Reading at one easy push of the button. Effortlessly turn the adjust knob to set the temperature precisely. And you are ready to go. All come together to elevate your soldering experience as it matters.

Choose YIHUA with Confidence – Enjoy our 12-month US- exclusive manufacturer technical coverage and 24/7 professional assistance on Amazon. Note: This model is designed to operate on 110-127V with a US-standard power plug.

name: WEP 8786D-I SE Hot Air Soldering Iron Station Kit 2-IN-1 for Rework, Desoldering with Lead-Free Solder Wire, 5 Soldering Tips, 3 Hot Air Nozzles,Tweezers, Desoldering Pump
short_description: 2-IN-1: With this soldering iron station you get both the soldering station with hot air rework station in one. This unit comes with individual digital temperature read-out(°F), power switches, adjustable hot air volume, and temperature controls.

Soldering Kit for electronics: This soldering iron kit includes a pack of solder wire, desoldering pump, tweezers, 3 hot air nozzles,5 soldering tips (I/B/K/3.2D/3C). You can start soldering as soon as you receive this solder kit.

Soldering Station: Adjustable temperature from 392-896°F, with PID stabilization function. Comes with 10-minute sleep mode to reduce wear when non-use for longer than 10 minutes, making your solder iron tips and heating elements last longer.

Hot air station: Adjustable temperature from 212-896°F, with PID stabilization function. Comes with hot air standby mode, when the hot air gun is inside the holder, the station cools hot air gun to 212°F and stops heating. This provides better user safety, longer heating element lifespan.

This Hot Air Rework Station Kit is covered by our exclusive 1-year USA technical support, with 24-hour assistance from our dedicated team. Note: This product is rated for 110-127V USA specifications. Do not connect this iron to a 220V power socket.
